name: LENDARIOS STORY BRIGHTNESS PART 1
description:
In a universe where there are 4 realms (Brightness, Darkness, Crystal and Earth), a brilliant teenager named Nikko Sasaki had not yet been able to use powers, a strange phenomenon, he and 3 other companions went to unravel this mystery and delve into many adventures.

The game is played in third person, has variations of combos, the characters have both long-range and short-range attacks.

Yellow eyes that can change fate
